name: XI [Sái]: Jumbo
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 115MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 115MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.

??

?Game description
Ultimately exhilarating! XI [sai] is back and bigger than ever! This time, the Aquis are a bit different. Now they can jump, lift, and create reserved chains! New types of actions are possible with simple controls! Three completely redesigned, full-featured modes are included! There's even your own private Aqui room where fights, events, and dancing await. With all the new features and modes, this game can only be described as JUMBO! Gigantic jumbo dice appear to make your life miserable!
• New types of actions are possible with simple controls!
Jump and lift with a single press of a button. Get those bothersome dice out of the way in no time!
• Three completely new, full-featured modes!
The Battle Mode has been completely redesigned. A two-field battle where opponents rain dice down upon each other is now used. Use your brain and vicious nature to defeat your opponent by snatching dice or hurling dice at them!
• Your own private Aqui room!
Fights, events, and dancing awaits. What sort of events could possible be in store?

?For playing with PSP®, single player game play only. Not compatible with multiple user play.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
115MB

?Supported Accessories
This software supported the vibration feature for DUALSHOCK®3 Wireless Controller. For vibration feature, The PS3™ system firmware 2.00 or later is required.

?Copyright notices
©1999 Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.
All rights reserved.


?Attention
This software is converted from the software for PlayStation® so that it can be played on PS3™ and PSP®.
Please note that there may be some functions that cannot be used due to the difference of hardware,
and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
